title: Commencement Ceremony Information
cleaned_text: Commission of Career Schools and Colleges (ACCSC) 2101 Wilson Boulevard, Suite 302 Arlington, Virginia 22201 [703.247.4212](tel:703.247.4212) | [www.accsc.org](https://www.accsc.org) The Professional Master's Level Acupuncture Program and the Master of Acupuncture Program are accredited by: Accreditation Commission for Acupuncture and Herbal Medicine (ACAHM) 8941 Aztec Drive, Suite 2, Eden Prairie, MN 55347 [952.212.2434](tel:952.212.2434) | [www.acahm.org](https://www.acahm.org) AIAM is authorized by the Ohio Department of Higher Education. 25 South Front Street Columbus, Ohio 43215 [614.466.6000](tel:614.466.6000) AIAM is registered with the Ohio State Board of Career Colleges and Schools.
